timeline.message: Added a new Town method, getNumResidentsOnline(), returning as integer the count of the online(s) resident(s) inside the town.
Added 3 "placeholders" ({town_motd}, {town_residents} and {town_residents_online}) who can be used inside notification.titles.*.

timeline.body: This needs to be removed, we already have a method `TownyAPI#getOnlineResidents()` that does this.
timeline.bodyText: This needs to be removed, we already have a method TownyAPI#getOnlineResidents() that does this.
timeline.bodyHTML: This needs to be removed, we already have a method TownyAPI#getOnlineResidents() that does this.

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
Fix Javadocs not generating.
Unify Town and Nation code, and introduce new Eco Account Mechanics (#3988)
Move translation code to separate object and introduce new method: Translation.of() (#4177)
Invite Cleanup (#4269)

- New Config Node: global_town_settings.keep_inventory_on_death_in_own_town     - Default: false     - If People should keep their inventories on death in their own town.     - Is not guaranteed to work with other keep inventory plugins!     - Closes #3859.   - New Config Node: global_town_settings.keep_inventory_on_death_in_allied_town     - Default: false     - If People should keep their inventories on death in an allied town.     - Is not guaranteed to work with other keep inventory plugins!     - Closes #3859.
- Fix missing switch test, solving problem with unresearched slimefun items allowing bypass of switch protections.     - Closes #4065.
Datasource Cleanup
Per-world Block Explosion Revert Setting. (#4358)
- Fix Citizens NPCs that use actual Resident names from throwing TownyExceptions when they enter/exit towns.     - Closes #4375.
DebugMessaging cleanup commit.
Merge pull request #4367 from TownyAdvanced/refactor/datasource_cleanup
Create Cancellable events when Towny makes decisions about PlotPermissions / Overhaul Item/Switch use. (#4392)
- Fix deny_bed_use not doing very much in the daytime.   - Fix a bunch of cases where we were pointlessly using NREs in the CombatUtil.
More explosions protections. (#4410)
Fix Malformed Javadoc Looks like a bad merge screwed up the Javadoc for TownyPlayerListener.onPlayerBlowsUpBedOrRespawnAnchor - preventing maven from properly functioning.
- Add item_use test for shears carving pumpkins.
Prevent outlaws from entering towns (#4428)
- Fix spam about respawn anchors on sub-1.16.* servers.     - Closes #4444.
Added config node  GTOWN_SETTINGS_OUTLAW_TELEPORT_WORLD - sets world … (#4442)
Cleanup Warning (#4463)
Backend Town UUID Implementation (#4421)
- Make TownyPermissionSource.has() private, replace calls to it with correct .testPermission() method.
Update TownyPlayerListener.java
Resident UUID Maps (#4510)
0.96.5.7:   - Fix invinci-beds when deny_bed_use was set to true and beds weren't on inn or personally-owned plots.     - Closes https://github.com/EarthMC/Issue-Tracker/issues/1279
- Fix slimefun unresearched items being able to bypass switch protections.     - Re-closes #4065.     - Closes https://github.com/Slimefun/Slimefun4/issues/2641
- Fix for NPE which could be thrown via the PlayerInteractEvent when an item was used without clicking a block.   - Fix /plot group toggle explosion showing the feedback message for fire.
0.96.5.11:   - Fix possible NPE in TownyPlayerListener.
Add save method to Towny objects. (#4670)

- Change it so that admins with the bypass node will not warn towns that an outlawed admin is spying on them.     - Previously only full admins were preventing warns.   - Refactor more commands to use HelpMenu.
Town command blacklisting (#4849)
Add TownBlock.getTownOrNull() and TownBlock.getResidentOrNull() and replace most uses of TownBlock.getResident(), as well as begin replacing uses of TownBlock.getTown().
Replace more TownBlock.getTown() with .getTownOrNull() where safe.
- Replace player.sendMessage() with TownyMessaging.sendMessage(), to facilitate further integration of the Adventure library for future-translation-plans.
- Fix sheep being protected from shearing in the wilderness.
Block commands from being ran by outsiders (#4953)
Jail Overhaul (#4703)
Protects copper blocks being waxed or scraped.
Protect extinguishing candles.
- Add candles to the bypass for flint & steel.   - Protect candles from being placed on cakes.
- Give Glowing Item Frames the same protections we give to the differently-abled Item Frames.
Add ability to prevent outlaws from teleporting or using certain commands while in a town (#5012)
Fix a NoSuchMethodError that can occur on 1.15 (#5030)
Improve safe mode messages in-game (#5013)
API: Add Town#hasResident(Player) and Town#hasResident(UUID).

- Add ability to teleport newly-outlawed players who are within the town's borders.     - Closes #4944.   - New Config Option: global_town_settings.outlaw_teleport_away_on_becoming_outlawed     - Default: false     - If set to true, when a player is made into an outlaw using /t outlaw add NAME, and that new outlaw is within the town's borders, the new outlaw will be teleported away using the outlaw_teleport_warmup.
Switch from TownyDataSource.getWorld() to TownyAPI.getInstance().getTownyWorld().
- Protect weatherable blocks from having their oxidation scraped off with an axe.     - Considered a destroy test.
- API: Add TeleportOutlawEvent.     - Allows for a plugin to cancel an outlaw being teleported out of a town.     - Closes #5109.
Move permissions check down
- Fix sending correct helpmessage to ops/admins who log in while safemode is active.
- Fix fishing being able to be bucketed.     - Closes #5213.
Concept/translation registry (#5167)
Prevent chickens being spawned without permission (#5237)
- Allow the notification.town_names_are_verbose setting to affect the {townname} placeholder usable in the titles/substitles notifications.
- Fix Axolotl thieving.

- Remove physical-player-interactions from automatically being treated as switch actions.     - Pressure plates are already included in the switch_id list by default and should cause no issue to existing servers.     - Closes #5140.
Adds spawn protection for players who've just died. (#5312)
Fix Citizens NPCs causing error on PlayerTeleportEvent.
- Add protection for glow berries being harvest off cave vines.     - Treated as a destroy test.
Cleanup util classes (#5348)

- API: add TownyAPI#getTownBlock(Player).   - New Config Option: global_town_settings.keep_inventory_on_death_in_arena     - Default: false     - If People should keep their inventories on death in an arena townblock.
- Made it possible for the {townname} placeholder to be used in the wilderness_title and wilderness_subtitle messages.
Prevent the theft of axolotls
Custom townblock types (#5388)

- New Config Node: global_town_settings.warn_town_on_outlaw_message_cooldown_in_seconds     - Default: "30",     - How many seconds in between warning messages, to prevent spam.   - Added outlawn message warning cooldown to prevent spam on servers where the outlaw warning message is turned on,     and the outlaw teleporting warmup is not set to 0.     - Closes #5582.
- Fix command blacklists not handling casing well.     - Closes #5586.
- Fix safe mode messages not appearing in game when the config is the reason for safe mode.
API: add PlayerDeniedBedUseEvent
- Fix potential NPE in PlayerInteractEvent listener.
Do a better job of catching when Citizens API is unavailable to us, (#5653)
- Fix Cow Milking requiring the ability to break air blocks.     - Closes #5691.
Remove assertions from flatfile source.
- Remove all methods deprecated prior to 0.97.0.0.   - Fix safe mode message unable to be shown when a player joins.
Set minimum MC version to 1.16.
Get bed spawn locations async in SpawnUtil (#5728)
ItemLists overhaul (#5737)
Add barrel to destroy blacklist for wall breaching.
- Fix outlaws being able to log out before they're teleported away.     - Closes #5753.
- Fix outlaw teleport feature conflicting with jailing of outlaws.
- Protect rooted_dirt being hoe-able.     - Closes #5805.
Merge pull request #5755 from TownyAdvanced/feature/drop_1_14_and_1_15_support
Adds /res toggle bordertitles
Fix us using the wrong location when a player clicks a waterloggable block. (#5736)
- API: New events:     - PlayerKeepsInventoryEvent     - PlayerKeepsExperienceEvent     - Two events that allow other plugins to cancel Towny saving player's inventory or xp orbs.
- Improve PlayerKeepsInventoryEvent and PlayerKeepsExperienceEvent by making PlayerDeathEvent accessible and providing #getKiller.
- Remove NotRegisteredException usage in calling PlayerEnterTownEvent and PlayerLeaveTownEvent.
Protect against cauldron filling/emptying (#5901)
Add option to disable pickups while under respawn protection (#5902)
Make respawn anchors respect the deny bed use option (#5942)
- Make respawn anchors respect the deny bed use option, courtesy of Warriorrrr with #5942.
Handle more kinds of changes to cauldrons
- Fix admins being unable to teleport out of Towns in which they are outlawed.
Swap isAdmin test for isAdmin && hasPermissionNode

- Automatic Config Edit:     - ,OAK_CHEST_BOAT will be added to your protections.switch_ids list.     - This will make all chest boats require switching perms to open/enter.     - New configs will have OAK_CHEST_BOAT included in the switch_ids list.
- Fix using World#isRespawnAnchorWorks() which did not exist in 1.16.5 api.     - Closes #6056.
Add null check to teleport listener
Simplify permission-checking code with NoPermissionException (#6045)
Improve command blocking

- New entering-town-placeholders:     - When players see town/wilderness notifications for entering towns there are now new options:       - {nationname} - Name of the nation.       - {nationcapital} - Name of the nation capital and nation.       - {nation_motd} - Shows the nationboard message.       - {nation_residents} - Shows the number of residents in the nation.       - {nation_residents_online} - Shows the number of residents online currently.     - Closes #6159.   - New Config Option: notification.titles.nationname_format     - Default: "&6Nation of %s"     - The format used to format the {nationame} option. The name of the nation will replace %s.   - New Config Option: notification.titles.nationcapital_format     - Default: "&6Entering %s, Capital City of %s"     - The format used to format the {nationcapital} option. The name of the capital city and nation will replace the %s and %s.

- Change to Config Option: notification.titles.nationcapital_format     - Default: "&6Entering %s, Capital City of %s"     - The format used to format the {nationcapital} option. The name of the capital city and nation will replace the %s and %s.     - Alternatively, you can use %t for townname and %n for nationname and show either one or both.
Put brick info tool behind infotool resident mode (#6212)
- Fix PlaceholderExpansion remaining registered during Towny reloads.     - Closes #6218.
- Fix MissingFormatArgumentException in PlayerEnterTownEvent usage of getCapitalSlug.
- Prevent tadpoles being stolen with a bucket.     - Closes #6241.
Event firing overhaul (#6250)
- Fix the rest of the places we didn't parse out underscores in wilderness names throughout Towny.
- Add protection to Chiseled Bookshelves for when they're added to the game.
- Simplify and condense permission tests, by giving NoPermissionException the ability to accept a Translatable.
Fix lecterns requiring destroy perms to open.
- Fix NoSuchMethodError on 1.16.5 servers regarding World#isRespawnAnchorWorks.
- Fix DeniedBedUseEvent result being listened to backwards.     - Closes #6310.
Undo last commit.
- Fix admins and ops being blocked by the blocked-commands lists.

- Fix possible tab complete npe, courtesy of Warriorrrr with PR #6331.   - Use method handles in townyperms, courtesy of Warriorrrr with PR #6332.   - Make ascii map symbol options reloadable, courtesy of Warriorrrr with PR #6333.   - API: Add new MetaDataType: Location.   - Use the world's wild revert delay, courtesy of Warriorrrr with PR #6343.   - Bump adventure-text-minimessage from 4.11.0 to 4.12.0.   - Bump adventure-text-serializer-plain from 4.11.0 to 4.12.0.

- Add ability to disallow commands being run by players that have an active war.     - Closes #3953.   - New Config Option: global_town_settings.war_blacklisted_commands     - Default: somecommandhere,othercommandhere     - Commands that cannot be run by players who have an active war.

- API: New (replacement) events:     - PlayerEntersIntoTownBorderEvent - Thrown when a player crosses into a town.     - PlayerExitsFromTownBorderEvent - Thrown when a player crosses out of a town.     - These events replace the now-deprecated PlayerEnterTownEvent and PlayerLeaveTownEvent which had names which were too ambiguous.
Lookup towny worlds via uuid

- Improve vanished-wont-affect-resident-last-online support, from using only Essentials, to supporting all plugins that use the "vanished" metadata on the player.     - Also prevents setting last-online when a player logs out.     - Plugins which work: SuperVanish, Essentials.     - Plugins which still do not work: VanishNoPacket.   - Remove internal usage of Essentials.     - Removed Config Node: using_essentials.     - Deprecated:       - TownySettings.isUsingEssentials,       - Towny.isUsingEssentials(),       - Towny.getEssentials().
- Fix nation-less towns rendering town-entered title messages poorly.
Ignore end portal respawns
Add PluginIntegrations class. (#6408)
Replace world with weakref in WorldCoord
Fix switch and item use being triggered on left-click (#6495)
- Remove town_spawn: true requirement for jailing altering jailed player's spawn points.
Fix pressure plates not respecting switch permissions
- Fix bed crop dupe found in Spigot or MC.

timeline.message: Removed unwanted empty line in TownyPlayerListener.java.
